entry.title: Madison Captain's Bed Twin/Single
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 1049.00

Description

  • Clean lines that work well with any decor
  • Ample storage and shelf space 
  • Four deep drawers
  • Durable slats eliminate the need for a box spring
  • Fits standard Twin/Single mattress 39” x 75”
  • Mattress not included*

Update your sleeping space with the Twin/Single Captain’s Bed. This bed houses a vertical slat footboard, four large storage drawers, and a panel door compartment. The complimentary bookshelf headboard also offers plenty of room for keepsakes with two-panel door compartments and two shelves. There is no need for a box spring as the sturdy slats offer plenty of mattress support. This bed is the perfect space-saving option for any bedroom or guestroom. 

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 48"H X 43"W X 86"D
Product Weight 211 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 17"H X 39"W X 39"D
Carton Shipping Weight 242 lbs.
Materials Engineered wood, Wood
Max Weight 225 lbs.

entry.title: Madison All-in-One Single Loft Bed 4pc
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 1889.00

Description

  • Clean lines that work well with any decor
  • Three drawer dresser and bookshelf space
  • Roll-out desk with storage 
  • Access ladder and safety rails
  • Platform design, no box spring required
  • Antiqued metal hardware
  • Fits a standard twin-sized mattress 39” x 75”
  • Stool not included
  • Mattress not included*

Your young adult's bedroom can now be clutter-free with the 4-Piece Loft Bed. This bed includes a chest of drawers, bookshelf, roll-out desk, and stool with rotating caster wheels. The roll-out desk features a drawer and console with a shelf for extra storage. The pieces can be moved around the room or tucked away to free up space. With sturdy wooden slats, there is no need for a box spring, perfect for any bedroom.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 45"H X 44"W X 80"D
Product Weight 189 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 18"H X 39"W X 39"D
Carton Shipping Weight 276 lbs.
Materials Engineered wood, Wood
Max Weight 124 lbs.
